SimEntity.author: pjsulliv
SimEntity.name: RHIB
SimEntity.Comment: A US Navy RHIB (Rigid Hull Inflatable Boat) typically found on DDG51, CG47, and FFG7 class US Navy Ships. RHIB's are manned by ships company with a crew of two to four personnel. In foreign ports these platforms are a primary resource for harbor patrol. NOTE: Visual perception and communications are behaviors representing the personnel onboard the craft and not the craft itself. As such, this event graph should not be used for Unmanned Surface Vehicles (USVs).

Parameter.name: startPosition
Parameter.Comment: Must be different then the first waypoint

StateVariable.name: visualPerception
StateVariable.Comment: Visual sense of RHIB crew

StateVariable.name: visualRange
StateVariable.Comment: Visual Range for the crew

StateVariable.name: avoidanceRange
StateVariable.Comment: Proximity tolerance for this contact. Will maneuver to avoid objects that will breach this range

StateVariable.name: tacticalMode
StateVariable.Comment: Tactical State that the RHIB is in (e.g. Patrolling, Intercepting)

StateVariable.name: patrolManager
StateVariable.Comment: Mover manager that manages entity movement based on diskit.ZoneGeometry patrol zones

StateVariable.name: waypointGenerator
StateVariable.Comment: Generates waypoints based on the diskit.ZoneGeometry for this entity

StateVariable.name: obstacleQueue
StateVariable.Comment: Stores and sorts obstacles based on proximity

StateVariable.name: targetQueue
StateVariable.Comment: Stores and sorts targets based on proximity

StateVariable.name: successfulIntercepts
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Total number of successful intercepts

StateVariable.name: unsuccessfulIntercepts
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Total number of successful intercepts

StateVariable.name: speed
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Average Speed of this entity

StateVariable.name: contactIDs
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Total number of contacts ID'd

StateVariable.name: canIntercept
StateVariable.Comment: Whether or not entity can catch up to contact

StateVariable.name: missedIDs
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Total number of missed IDs due to distance

StateVariable.name: distanceFromMissedAttacker
StateVariable.Comment: DATA: Distance from attacker at time of successful attack

StateVariable.name: destination
StateVariable.Comment: This entities current destination

StateVariable.name: calc
StateVariable.Comment: Calculates intercept and avoidance

StateVariable.name: idAttempts
StateVariable.Comment: number of times it should take to id a contact

StateVariable.name: amm
StateVariable.Comment: MoverManager for avoiding collision

StateVariable.name: collisionAvoidance
StateVariable.Comment: Sensor that is used for collision avoidance

StateVariable.name: contactPicture
StateVariable.Comment: List of all contacts in this entities contact picture

Event.name: Run
Event.Comment: Initializes all state variables for each simulation run.

Event.name: Init
Event.Comment: Used by diskit.ScenarioManager to register all entities

Event.name: RegisterTarget
Event.Comment: Registers this mover with the simulation

Event.name: RegisterSensors
Event.Comment: Registers this entity's sensor with the simulation. Also registers a SimEventListener between this mover and its sensor

Argument.name: sensors
Argument.Comment: Collection of sensors for this entity

Event.name: CreateZones
Event.Comment: Listens to diskit.SceneZoneCreator to get Patrol Zone responsibilities

LocalVariable.name: zoneReader
LocalVariable.Comment: Reads Zones for only those that are for this entity

Event.name: Patrol
Event.Comment: Patrolling behavior for this entity. Speed is random and always less than the max speed

LocalVariable.name: rn
LocalVariable.Comment: Pseudorandom number generator for fluxuating speeds and times between patrol movements

LocalVariable.name: currentSpeed
LocalVariable.Comment: creates a crusing speed between zero and the max speed of this craft

LocalVariable.name: waypoint
LocalVariable.Comment: Provides a waypoint within the geometry specified

Event.name: Detection
Event.Comment: The Sensor of this entity has detected a contact

Argument.name: sensor
Argument.Comment: The sensor of the contact detected

LocalVariable.name: entityID
LocalVariable.Comment: Find out the id# of this entity for comparison

LocalVariable.name: interceptOffset
LocalVariable.Comment: Stay outside the contacts avoidance range for routine intercept

Schedule.Comment: Should not avoid contacts if you are intercepting them
Check to see if contact is a friend, if not, close contact for ID
TODO: getEntityType call instead of entity ID numbers

Event.name: EvaluateContact
Event.Comment: Intercept is possible, proceeds to contact to make an evaluation

Argument.name: idIdx
Argument.Comment: Creates time loop for doing an ID

Argument.name: obstacle
Argument.Comment: Mover that is a potential obstacle

Event.name: AvoidObstacle
Event.Comment: Uses diskit.AvoidanceMoverManager to stop the normal MoverManager, perform the avoidance based on the diskit.util.MovementCalculator calculations, and then allows the normal mover manager to take over after the contact is avoided. AvoidanceMoverManager accepts both the avoidance point and the current mover manager as arguments

LocalVariable.name: avoidancePoint
LocalVariable.Comment: The point this mover should go to to avoid collision

Event.name: Intercept
Event.Comment: Gets the intercept point and determines if intercept is possible based on speed of contact and max speed of this entity

LocalVariable.name: timeToIntercept
LocalVariable.Comment: Get the amount of time that it will take to intercept this contact

LocalVariable.name: numOfSensors
LocalVariable.Comment: Number of Sensor for this entity

LocalVariable.name: sensors
LocalVariable.Comment: Collection of sensors for this entity
